locations.name: Oakhaven Village
locations.description: A quaint village nestled at the edge of the Whispering Woods.

locations.name: Whispering Woods
locations.description: An ancient forest filled with whispers and secrets, haunted by a restless spirit.

locations.name: Willow Grove
locations.description: A clearing in the Whispering Woods where a weeping willow tree stands, said to hold the spirits of the forest.

locations.name: Elder Willow
locations.description: An ancient and wise willow tree that whispers secrets to those who listen closely.

locations.name: Aethelred's Tomb
locations.description: A hidden crypt within the Whispering Woods, where the spirit of Aethelred lies restless.

locations.name: Ghostly Meadow
locations.description: A misty meadow where spirits gather, said to hold clues to the past.

locations.name: Forgotten Shrine
locations.description: A crumbling shrine dedicated to nature spirits, overgrown with vines and moss.

locations.name: Raven's Roost
locations.description: A cliffside perch where a flock of ravens reside, known for their intelligence and connection to the unseen world.

locations.name: Crystal Caves
locations.description: Luminous caves filled with sparkling crystals, said to amplify magic and visions.

locations.name: Sunken Grove
locations.description: A partially submerged grove where ancient trees reach towards the sky, guarded by strange creatures.
